businesses.name: Evanston 1st Liquors
businesses.Description: , is one of Evanston's most popular liquor stores. They have a huge selection of alcoholic beveragesâ€“ from wine to craft beers to tasty mixers. The store is also conveniently located in front of Cozy Noodles & Rice, which is a yummy BYOB restaurant. Stop by Evanston 1st to grab a nice bottle of wine before going to dinner. Must be 21+.
